ComicInfo.Summary: Alan Moore's visionary tale reveals the truth and horror behind the lavish trappings of Celestine's fashion empire. As the world teeters on the verge of self-destruction, and Doll witnesses the final moments of her benefactor, a choice must be made. And Doll does the unthinkable by proclaiming who the phoenix of Celestine's empire will beâ€¦ The end is near and the choices made will either spell the salvation of it or usher in its utter ruin.
